data.name: Vampiric Crown
data.detailed_description:
Vampiric Crown is a side-scrolling action RPG set in a strange gothic world. A young vampire girl decides to rebel against her race, upon discovering that her sister will be the victim of a macabre plan to unearth the prince of darkness, who has been hidden for centuries in the depths of Dracula's mysterious castle.

Key Features

  • Full character customization
  • 3+ Different endings
  • 5+ Extra playable characters
  • 100+ Enemies and 20 Epic bosses
  • 80+ Secret areas to discover
  • Unlockable items and cosmetics
  • Boss Rush Mode
  • Nightmare Mode
  • Speed Run Mode
  • Versus Mode (Local Multiplayer)

data.supported_languages:
English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k 3.5 GHz /AMD Ryzen 3 1300X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 3GB /AMD Radeon R9 285 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
